name: Another Hero (Gwendolyn Yamashita)
description:
Set in a medieval fantasy world, Sir George wakes up to find his knave has disappeared with all his belongings. He sets out to find out the truth behind this betrayal.

This is a short first look demo to give a taste for setting, story, and puzzle design.

INSTRUCTIONS: 
Left click - Interact
Right click - Look
Inventory and menu bar at the top
